body_html: Hi noob here, how would I build from source? is there a guide? I don't quite understand what it means to built from source and I've just spent entire day finding this post as I'm stuck on this specific issue. ... thanks 😄 Also I'm on windows 8.1 which is quite painful... I might just go re download the cuda 9.0
